name: Jeep
description: Jeep is an American automobile marque, now owned by Stellantis. It is known for its rugged off-road vehicles and military origins.

name: GMC
description: GMC (General Motors Truck Company) is a division of the American automobile manufacturer General Motors, primarily focused on trucks and utility vehicles.

name: Dodge
founder: Horace Elgin Dodge and John Francis Dodge
description: Dodge is an American brand of automobiles, a division of Stellantis, known for its performance cars, trucks, and SUVs.

name: RAM
description: RAM Trucks, a division of Stellantis, focuses on light to mid-weight commercial vehicles and pickup trucks.

name: Nissan
description: Nissan is a Japanese multinational automobile manufacturer, known for producing a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

name: Ford
description: Ford Motor Company is an American multinational automaker that has its main headquarters in Dearborn, Michigan. It was founded by Henry Ford.

name: Hyundai
description: Hyundai Motor Company is a South Korean multinational automotive manufacturer headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Chevrolet
founder: Louis Chevrolet and William C. Durant
description: Chevrolet, colloquially referred to as Chevy, is an American automobile division of the American manufacturer General Motors.

name: Volkswagen
description: Volkswagen is a German motor vehicle manufacturer headquartered in Wolfsburg, Germany, known for the iconic Beetle and a wide range of vehicles.

name: Chrysler
description: Chrysler is one of the 'Big Three' automobile manufacturers in the United States, now a part of Stellantis.

name: Kia
description: Kia Corporation is a South Korean multinational automotive manufacturer headquartered in Seoul, known for producing a wide range of vehicles.

name: Mazda
description: Mazda Motor Corporation is a Japanese multinational automaker based in FuchÅ«, Hiroshima, Japan, known for its innovative rotary engine technology.

name: Acura
description: Acura is the luxury vehicle division of the Japanese automaker Honda, known for its performance and luxury vehicles.

name: Subaru
description: Subaru is the automobile manufacturing division of the Japanese transportation conglomerate Subaru Corporation, known for its use of the boxer engine layout.

name: Audi
description: Audi is a German automobile manufacturer that designs, engineers, produces, markets, and distributes luxury vehicles.

name: BMW
founder: Franz Josef Popp, Karl Rapp, and Camillo Castiglioni
description: BMW (Bayerische Motoren Werke AG) is a German multinational company which produces luxury vehicles and motorcycles.

name: Toyota
description: Toyota Motor Corporation is a Japanese multinational automotive manufacturer headquartered in Toyota City, Japan.

name: Buick
description: Buick is a division of the American automobile manufacturer General Motors, offering primarily luxury vehicles.

name: Mercedes-Benz
description: Mercedes-Benz is a German global automobile marque and a division of Daimler AG, known for luxury vehicles, buses, coaches, and trucks.

name: Honda
description: Honda Motor Co., Ltd. is a Japanese public multinational conglomerate known for manufacturing automobiles, motorcycles, and power equipment.

name: Lincoln
description: Lincoln, formally the Lincoln Motor Company, is a luxury vehicle division of the American automobile manufacturer Ford.

name: Cadillac
description: Cadillac is a division of the American automobile manufacturer General Motors that designs and builds luxury vehicles.

name: INFINITI
description: INFINITI is the luxury vehicle division of the Japanese automaker Nissan, headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

name: Lexus
description: Lexus is the luxury vehicle division of the Japanese automaker Toyota, known for its reliability and luxury.

name: Land Rover
description: Land Rover is a British brand of predominantly four-wheel drive, off-road capable vehicles, owned by multinational car manufacturer Jaguar Land Rover.

name: Volvo
description: Volvo Cars is a Swedish luxury automobile manufacturer headquartered in Torslanda in Gothenburg.

name: Genesis
description: Genesis Motor, LLC is the luxury vehicle division of the South Korean vehicle manufacturer Hyundai Motor Group.

name: Jaguar
description: Jaguar is a brand of Jaguar Land Rover, a British multinational car manufacturer, known for luxury and sports cars.
